title: This game has been around long enough
body:
And I think it is time to remove or change how the free champion rotation works.

There is no or very little harm in giving free champs to new players, let's say 5-10 of the oldest or easiest to play champs in the game and completely remove the free champ rotation. Instead replace it with an IP renting system so you can either rent a single, or a block of say 5 champs at a time for anything from a game to a week.

It is great to be able to try new champs, but let's face it, no matter how well you can play a champ, if it is free there will always somewhere be someone complaining in some form about taking a free OP champ just because they are OP or something.
